pageProps.title: About Me
pageProps.content:
# **Rent-A-Car Website (Freelance Project - 2020)**  
🚗 **Developing a Seamless Car Rental Platform** 🚗  

Back in **2020**, I had the opportunity to work on an exciting **freelance project on Upwork**—a **Rent-A-Car** website built using **PHP & MySQL**. The goal was to develop a user-friendly and efficient platform where customers could browse, book, and manage car rentals effortlessly.  

🔹 **Key Features:**  
✅ **User Registration & Authentication** – Secure login for customers  
✅ **Car Listings & Search** – Intuitive interface for browsing vehicles  
✅ **Booking System** – Automated reservation handling with real-time confirmations  
✅ **Payment Integration** – Secure online transactions  
✅ **Admin Dashboard** – Easy vehicle, booking, and customer management  

This project gave me hands-on experience in backend development, **UI/UX design**, and **payment gateway integration**, while also improving my ability to work with international clients and meet deadlines. It was a great learning experience that sharpened my web development skills!  

💬 Let’s connect and discuss innovative digital solutions together!  

---

### **Online Library Management System (Personal Project)**  
📚 **Digitizing Library Operations with PHP & MySQL** 📚  

I developed an **Online Library Management System**, a web-based platform designed to streamline the entire book-borrowing process. This project was a deep dive into **backend automation, user authentication, and database management**.  

🔹 **Key Features:**  
📖 **Book Catalog** – Organized collection with search & filter options  
🔐 **User Registration & Login** – Secure access for library members  
🔄 **Borrow & Return System** – Automated tracking of issued books  
🖥 **Admin Panel** – Efficient management of books, loans, and overdue tracking  
💰 **Fine Calculation** – Automated assessment for late returns  

This project strengthened my skills in **PHP, MySQL**, and **UI/UX development**, making it a valuable addition to my portfolio.  

🚀 **Looking forward to more exciting projects and collaborations!**
